VIII.iv.6.B.5.h
.
Obtaining an Advisory Opinion for 1151 Claims
Submit unusually difficult cases involving claims for compensation under
38 U.S.C. 1151
to the Director of Compensation Service for an advisory opinion.
Reference
:  For more information on Compensation Service guidance and advisory opinions, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, 1.A
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B - Rating Claims Filed Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
